(The following is not a test.  It is real.  The only reason I am attack Rdahl 
is for some reason he wants me to capture some of his characters and after I 
abduct them and enter the IGL.  He's probably to lazy to have his characters 
go willingly :)

Sequencer/Sinew/Captain Nemo:





Two skimmers descended rapidly.

"Sinew, we have arrived.  Scanners detecting the subjects.  Shall we proceed?"

"Why do we need them?"

"The President requests more entrees.  And here we are."

"Great..." Sinew sighed.  The robot powered up its wrist cannons as a hatch 
opened outside of the skimmer.  He leapt out, his boosters activating.  
Several humanoids leapt out of the hatch as well, jetpacks strapped to their 
backs as they descended rapidly.

"Unit Menasor, prepare ofr extermination!" Sinew yelled down, his wrists 
firing off a rocket each, two rockets heading down towards Menasor's chest.

The several gumby humanoids opened fire, a few had laser rifles, a few had 
missile launchers.  All the while both skimmers were charging their main 
weapons and locking onto the gestalt.  Two mechanical destablizer shells were 
launched at Menasor.  If they struck successfully, they would paralyze 
Menasor for several hours until they were removed.

--------

Two skimmers flew near the Himalayas, taking a more safer approach.  Both 
skimmers fired off three mechanical destablizer shells, one each heading for 
the Technobots and one for Cliffjumper.

Captain Nemo sat at the bridge of one of the skimmers.  "Prepare four teams 
of men to go down and retrieve them."

"Yes, Captain." a sergeant replied, acting on the captain's orders 
immediately.
